about_the_game:
StarTron is a 3rd person arcade game, which is a simulator of a rich space flight, accompanied by an atmospheric sound track (music).
Dynamic action awaits you, a variety of obstacles and opponents, the choice of spaceships depending on your experience. Destroy, develop, and take your place in the rating table!

- A new look at the forgotten old.
Few still remember the good arcade slot machines of the 80s, where players gathered to get a number of positive emotions and show their skills. In Strartron, you will recapture the feeling of big wins in the world of tube arcades of yesteryear, with visuals and sounds appropriate to the time, but retaining its atmosphere.

- High level of dynamics.
Along the route of the space flight, you will expect an endless stream of bright and rich locations filled with opponents, which, you can be sure, you will not be able to ignore.

- There is sound in a vacuum.
We made sure that your path through bright locations and the destruction of everything hostile was accompanied by the same rich music and sound accompaniment.

- To infinity and beyond.
The combination of increasing dynamics of the gameplay, as well as visual and sound accompaniment, will give you a bright range of emotions. Improve your skills and open more and more distant sections of the path of your space adventure, find your limit, and overcome it!

- Game features:
1. Bright stylized locations;
2. 6 spaceships available depending on your experience;
3. High level of game dynamics;
4. Rhythmic soundtracks that play in contrast with what is happening.

name: StarTron

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit OS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit OS

short_description: Take a part in a flight trough endless route of lightning sparks and explosive shells, take on the battle with the furious inhabitants of outer space and conquer these places, under wonderful cosmic tunes, in the name of glory!
